mapper.insert: insert into tbl_topmember (name, age, gender, studentNum, department, address, job, stage, prize, phone, position, email) values(#{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{studentNum}, #{department}, #{address}, #{job}, #{stage}, #{prize}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{email})
mapper.select: select name, gender, stage, department, phone from tbl_topmember
mapper.update: update tbl_board_book set name =#{name}, age =#{age}, gender =#{gender}, studentNum =#{studentNum}, department =#{department}, address =#{address}, job =#{job}, stage =#{stage}, prize =#{prize}, phone =#{phone}, position =#{position}, mail =#{mail}
